means: 在（硬物）上雕刻（字，画等）( engrave的现在分词 )
将某事物深深印在（记忆或头脑中）

sentence.Network_en: He collected an old engraving of London Bridge.
sentence.Network_cn: 他收藏了一张古老的伦敦桥版画。

sentence.Network_en: Some writing has the precision of a steel engraving.
sentence.Network_cn: 有的字体严谨如同钢刻.

sentence.Network_en: The engraving was rolling up in a sheet of tissue paper.

entry.def: An engraving is a picture or design that has been cut into a surface.
An engraving is a picture that has been printed from a plate on which designs have been cut.

example.ex: ...a color engraving of oranges and lemons.
example.tran: 橙子和柠檬的彩色版画

means.word_mean: 1. a print made from an engraving
2. a block or plate that has been engraved
3. making engraved or etched plates and printing designs from them
